tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hashtags (
    hashtag_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    hashtag_name STRING,
    post_id UUID,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    post_content STRING
);
CREATE TABLE hashtags (id INT, tag VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, frequency INT, PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE posts (id INT, content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE post_hashtags (post_id INT, hashtag_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts(id), FOREIGN KEY (hashtag_id) REFERENCES hashtags(id));
CREATE TABLE tag_stats (tag_id INT, total_usage INT, last_used TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (tag_id), FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES hashtags(id));

CREATE TABLE posts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    hashtag_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (hashtag_id) REFERENCES hashtags(id)
);
